comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: pverin31 on May 24, 2023, 10:18:20 PMHave you already found your dream copy trading/trading signals platform or are you still waiting for it ? I have not actually gotten myself involved with copy trading before, and I have not seen any reason to do that either, because I always derive pleasure from holding a few coins while the price goes up and down, and most times I just have to buy a few coins myself based on my own personal analysis, and I find those coins worthy of my investment.But one thing I actually don't like about copy trading is that I see the next trader to whom I'm to copy his or her trade as a God who can never make a mistake, and as such, I am putting my hope and trusting my own funds in his decision, and if the market goes against his prediction, I will now be blaming the trader instead of taking the blame upon myself. This is something I actually don't want to do.Â .Quote*:My ref link to help me go up in the waiting list :-)It's actually not healthy to share a referral link here

comments.author: Gallar
comments.body: Quote from: pverin31 on May 24, 2023, 10:18:20 PMHave you already found your dream copy trading/trading signals platform or are you still waiting for it ?As long as I have been trading in this crypto field, so far I have never joined a trading signal platform. I don't know why, but I'm just not interested in platforms like that. Because I think, if I only rely on trading signal platforms in my trading in crypto, I think my trading skills will not develop properly. Because from the start I decided to trade in the crypto field, I have determined, I want to become an expert in that field. So I started trading in crypto starting from the bottom, from I couldn't analyze the market, then I learned from many media websites that explained the science of trading in crypto, which I wanted to learn, then I also learned a lot from the mistakes I experienced when doing crypto trading, and after that, gradually my skills in crypto trading got better. So until now, I'm not interested in the platform as you describe. Because I also believe in my personal abilities more than having to depend on other people. But such a platform will definitely help, for people who are too busy with work outside of crypto trading, because for sure, the time to do market analysis will be hampered. So this trading signal platform will definitely help more people who are too busy to do market analysis.

comments.author: pverin31
comments.body: Quote from: Woodie on May 31, 2023, 10:32:28 AMInteresting and how exactly will this work...main account enters trade then the slaves follow or its the best signal given and trade takes it or leaves it ??Well the product is about to launch to I haven't seen it and can only tell you what I have read so far.In short, the platform collects historical and realtime data from the Finance futures database.In the leader board, you can search for a trader that has the trading style and performances that you like.And can decide to follow him (it's also possible to follow multiple traders)From that moment you receive on you phone on telegram a message every time that a followed trader opens or closes a position.Then it's you to decide to follow him of not by executing the same trade on any exchange that has the same trading pair.The advantage is that you are not following passively, you can manage your own risk but you benefit from the trader analysis so basically you save time.Â  Quote from: Woodie on May 31, 2023, 10:32:28 AMSo does this service come with a trail run to see how good the guys behind the project are or do you have a trading view account where we can track your profitability journey???As you execute your trades on your own on the chosen exchange platform, you can see your profitability there.Quote from: Woodie on May 31, 2023, 10:32:28 AMUnfortunately Ã m a huge advocate on people learning how to trade on their own and not waiting to be fed signals and the alike, of course you might ague to say most are not profitable but its part of the process to train you on how to manage emotions, get the experience of live trading etcetera. I fully agree, that it's better to have a minimal understanding of trading. I think this product can be viewed as an accelerator in the learning process. I have tried myself various option, including copy trading but I prefer to do the trades myself as I was able to witness that traders that appears to be performant can also make huge mistake. Full copy-trading makes you feel too passive.You trust the trader.s while they perform well, then you bet a bit more and that's where they loose and you as well.But to go in your direction, other products will be delivered the same year. one of them will be related to learning contents if I am not mistaking.
